languages.text: "Это утверждение истинно. В ином храме Омниссии только слуга Его способен умилостивить дух машины. Однако архитекторы местной инфраструктуры вмешались в стандартную структуру когитаторной сети..." {n}В голосе Паскаля сквозит недовольство.{/n} "...чтобы оснастить мостик машиной, допускающей использование мирянами с определенной биологической сигнатурой. Членами династии фон Валанциус".

"This statement is true. In another temple of the Omnissiah, only His servant would be able to propitiate the machine spirit. However, the architects of this vessel's infrastructure made unsanctioned changes to the standard structure of the cogitator network..." {n}Displeasure creeps into Pasqal's voice.{/n} "...to equip the bridge with a machine that would permit its use by laypeople with a specific biological signature — members of House von Valancius."
languages.original_text: "Это утверждение истинно. В ином храме Омниссии только слуга Его способен умилостивить дух машины. Однако архитекторы местной инфраструктуры вмешались в стандартную структуру когитаторной сети..." {n}В голосе Паскаля сквозит недовольство.{/n} "...чтобы оснастить мостик машиной, допускающей использование мирянами с определенной биологической сигнатурой. Членами династии фон Валанциус".

"This statement is true. In another temple of the Omnissiah, only His servant would be able to propitiate the machine spirit. However, the architects of this vessel's infrastructure made unsanctioned changes to the standard structure of the cogitator network..." {n}Displeasure creeps into Pasqal's voice.{/n} "...to equip the bridge with a machine that would permit its use by laypeople with a specific biological signature — members of House von Valancius."

languages.text: “这种说法是正确的。在欧姆尼塞亚的神殿中，只有祂的仆人才有权向机魂祈祷。然而，这艘船基础架构的设计师们在未经允许的情况下，擅自篡改了沉思者网络的标准架构……”{n}帕斯卡的声音带着一丝不满。{/n}“为舰桥配备了一台机器。这台机器只有拥有特定生物特征的普通人，也就是冯·瓦兰修斯家族的成员，才能使用。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. In another temple of the Omnissiah, only His servant would be able to propitiate the machine spirit. However, the architects of this vessel's infrastructure made unsanctioned changes to the standard structure of the cogitator network..." {n}Displeasure creeps into Pasqal's voice.{/n} "...to equip the bridge with a machine that would permit its use by laypeople with a specific biological signature — members of House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: “这个说法确实没错。在欧姆尼塞亚的神殿中，只有祂的仆人才有权向机魂祈祷。然而，这艘船基础架构的设计师们在未经允许的情况下，擅自篡改了思考器网络的标准架构……”{n}帕斯卡的声音带着一丝不满。{/n}“为舰桥配备了一台机器。这台机器只有拥有特定生物特征的普通人，也就是冯·瓦兰修斯家族的成员，才能使用。”

languages.text: 「この言葉は真実です。万機神の別の神殿では、神のしもべだけが機械精霊を鎮めることができるのです。ですが、この船のインフラの設計者は、考算機ネットワークの標準的な構造に無許可で変更を加えたようです…」{n}パスカルの声に不愉快さがにじむ。{/n}「…特定の生物学的特徴を持つ人物、つまりフォン・ヴァランシウス家のメンバーによってのみ使用が許可される機械をブリッジに装備するために」
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. In another temple of the Omnissiah, only His servant would be able to propitiate the machine spirit. However, the architects of this vessel's infrastructure made unsanctioned changes to the standard structure of the cogitator network..." {n}Displeasure creeps into Pasqal's voice.{/n} "...to equip the bridge with a machine that would permit its use by laypeople with a specific biological signature — members of House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: 「この言葉は真実です。万機神の別の神殿では、神のしもべだけが機械精霊を鎮めることができるでしょうう。ですが、この船のインフラの設計者は、考算機ネットワークの標準的な構造に無許可で変更を加えたようです…」{n}パスカルの声に不愉快さがにじむ。{/n}「…特定の生物学的特徴を持つ一般人、つまりフォン・ヴァランシウス家のメンバーによって使用を許可する機械をブリッジに装備するために」
「この言葉は真実です。万機神の別の神殿では、神のしもべだけが機械精霊を鎮めることができるのです。ですが、この船のインフラの設計者は、考算機ネットワークの標準的な構造に無許可で変更を加えたようです…」{n}パスカルの声に不愉快さがにじむ。{/n}「…特定の生物学的特徴を持つ人物、つまりフォン・ヴァランシウス家のメンバーによってのみ使用が許可される機械をブリッジに装備するために」

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. In einem anderen Tempel des Omnissiah könnte nur sein Diener des Maschinengeist beschwichtigen. Aber die Architekten der Infrastruktur dieses Schiffs haben ungenehmigte Änderungen an der Standardstruktur des Cogitator-Netzwerks vorgenommen ..." {n}In Pasqals Stimme klingt Unmut mit.{/n} "... nämlich die Brücke mit einer Maschine auszustatten, die von Laien mit einer spezifischen biologischen Signatur bedient werden kann – Mitglieder des Hauses von Valancius."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. In another temple of the Omnissiah, only His servant would be able to propitiate the machine spirit. However, the architects of this vessel's infrastructure made unsanctioned changes to the standard structure of the cogitator network..." {n}Displeasure creeps into Pasqal's voice.{/n} "...to equip the bridge with a machine that would permit its use by laypeople with a specific biological signature — members of House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. In einem anderen Tempel des Omnissiah könnte nur sein Diener des Maschinengeist beschwichtigen. Aber die Architekten der Infrastruktur dieses Schiffs haben ungenehmigte Änderungen an der Standardstruktur des Cogitator-Netzwerks vorgenommen ..." {n}In Pasqals Stimme klingt Unmut mit.{/n} "... nämlich die Brücke mit einer Maschine auszustatten, die von Laien mit einer spezifischen biologischen Signatur bedient werden kann – Mitglieder des Hauses von Valancius."

languages.text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. Dans un autre temple de l'Omnimessie, seuls Ses servants seraient en capacité d'apaiser l'esprit de la machine. Mais les concepteurs de l'infrastructure de ce vaisseau ont apporté des modifications non autorisées sur l'architecture réseau du cogitateur... » {n}Le mécontentement transparaît dans la voix de Pasqal.{/n} « ... en installant sur le pont une machine capable d'autoriser son utilisation aux profanes présentant une signature biologique spécifique : les membres de la maison von Valancius. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. In another temple of the Omnissiah, only His servant would be able to propitiate the machine spirit. However, the architects of this vessel's infrastructure made unsanctioned changes to the standard structure of the cogitator network..." {n}Displeasure creeps into Pasqal's voice.{/n} "...to equip the bridge with a machine that would permit its use by laypeople with a specific biological signature — members of House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: « Cette affirmation est correcte. Dans un autre temple de l'Omnimessie, seuls Ses servants seraient en capacité d'apaiser l'esprit de la machine. Mais les concepteurs de l'infrastructure de ce vaisseau ont apporté des modifications non autorisées sur l'architecture réseau du cogitateur... » {n}Le mécontentement transparaît dans la voix de Pasqal.{/n} « ... en installant sur le pont une machine capable d'autoriser son utilisation aux profanes présentant une signature biologique spécifique : les membres de la maison von Valancius. »

languages.text: «Esa afirmación es correcta. En otro templo del Omnissiah, solo Sus sirvientes pueden apaciguar al espíritu máquina, pero los arquitectos de la infraestructura de esta nave realizaron cambios no aprobados a la estructura estándar de la red de cogitadores...». {n}La desaprobación se hace evidente en la voz de Pasqal.{/n} «... para otorgar al puente una máquina que permita su uso a los legos con una señal biológica específica: los miembros de la casa von Valancius».
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. In another temple of the Omnissiah, only His servant would be able to propitiate the machine spirit. However, the architects of this vessel's infrastructure made unsanctioned changes to the standard structure of the cogitator network..." {n}Displeasure creeps into Pasqal's voice.{/n} "...to equip the bridge with a machine that would permit its use by laypeople with a specific biological signature — members of House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: «Esa afirmación es correcta. En otro templo del Omnissiah, solo Sus sirvientes pueden apaciguar al espíritu máquina, pero los arquitectos de la infraestructura de esta nave realizaron cambios no aprobados a la estructura estándar de la red de cogitadores...». {n}La desaprobación se hace evidente en la voz de Pasqal.{/n} «... para otorgar al puente una máquina que permita su uso a los legos con una señal biológica específica: los miembros de la casa von Valancius».

languages.text: "Bu önerme doğru. Başka bir Hermesih tapınağında olsaydık, makine ruhunu yalnızca O'nun hizmetkârları yatıştırabilirdi ancak bu geminin altyapısının mimarları, kavramsayar ağının standart yapısında bazı onaylanmamış değişiklikler yapmışlar." {n}Pasqal'ın sesine hoşnutsuzluk tınısı sızıyor.{/n} "Köprüye uzmanlık alanı bu olmayan ama belli bir biyolojik imzaya sahip olan birinin, yani bir von Valancius Hanesi üyesinin kullanabileceği bir makine yerleştirmişler."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. In another temple of the Omnissiah, only His servant would be able to propitiate the machine spirit. However, the architects of this vessel's infrastructure made unsanctioned changes to the standard structure of the cogitator network..." {n}Displeasure creeps into Pasqal's voice.{/n} "...to equip the bridge with a machine that would permit its use by laypeople with a specific biological signature — members of House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme doğru. Başka bir Hermesih tapınağında olsaydık, makine ruhunu yalnızca O'nun hizmetkârları yatıştırabilirdi ancak bu geminin altyapısının mimarları, kavramsayar ağının standart yapısında bazı onaylanmamış değişiklikler yapmışlar." {n}Pasqal'ın sesindeki hoşnutsuzluk açıkça duyuluyor.{/n} "Köprüye uzmanlık alanı bu olmayan ama belli bir biyolojik imzaya sahip olan birinin, yani bir von Valancius Hanesi üyesinin kullanabileceği bir makine inşa etmişler."
